Events that occurred on 2 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1916 - J.R.R. Tolkien receives orders to report in Folkestone, and prepare for embarking.
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Maegraith.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 323.
1978 - Tolkien scholar Dimitra Fimi is born.
2009 - The Deluxe Edition of The Legend of Sigurd and Gudr√∫n is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
